Arcane Gate (S6 Conj): R10'/500' Creates teleporation portal pair for conc or 10 min

Creation (S5 Illu): R30' Creates 5' cu of false matter lasting up to 1 dy
Death Ward (S4 [Runechild] Abju): Touched keeps 1 HP when next reduced to 0 HP for 8 hrs
Detect Magic (S1 Divi): R30' Self senses magic auras for conc or 10 min
Dispel Magic (S3 Abju): R120' Ends spell effects up to spell level 3 on target, higher levels require DC 10 + spell level check

Etherealness (S7 Tran): Self enters Ethereal Plane for up to 8 hr
Freedom Of Movement (S4 [Runechild] Abju): Touched gains immunity to impediments for 1 hr
Friends (S0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Cha checks w/target for conc or 1 min
Gate (S9 Conj): R60' Opens circular portal to another plane for conc or 1 min

Greater Restoration (S5 [Runechild] Abju): Touched becomes unexhausted, uncharmed, unpetrified, or uncursed or regains ability or HP
Ice Storm (S4 Evoc): R300' 20' radius inflicts 2d8 bludgeoning and 4d6 HP cold (Dex half)
Incendiary Cloud (S8 Conj): R150' 20' radius inflicts 10d8 HP fire (Dex half), moves away 10'/rd for conc or 1 min
Insect Plague (S5 Conj): R300' 20' radius inflicts 4d10 HP piercing (Con half) for conc or 10 min
Lesser Restoration (S2 [Runechild] Abju): Touched becomes unblinded, undeafened, undiseased, unparalyzed, or unpoisoned
Longstrider (S1 [Runechild] Tran): Touched gains +10' Speed for 1 hr
Mage Armor (S1 Abju): Touched gains AC 13 + DexMod in no armor for 8 hr
Mage Hand (S0 Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks moving up to 10 lb for 1 min
Magic Circle (S3 [Runechild] Abju): R10' 10' circle prevents passage and inflicts DisAdv on attacks by specified creature type for 1 hr
Magic Missile (S1 Evoc): R120' 3 darts inflict 1d4+1 HP force each
Major Image (S3 Illu): R120' Creates 20' cu sight, sound, and touch illusion for conc or 10 min
Message (W0 Tran): R120' Self and target have whispered conversation for 1 rd
Move Earth (S6 Tran): R120' Reshapes 40' cu of earth for conc or 2 hr
Plane Shift (S7 Conj): Target or self and 8 willing others travel to another plane (Cha neg)
Prestidigitation (S0 Tran): R10' Self performs minor magic effects for 1 hr
Protection From Evil And Good (S1 [Runechild] Abju): Willing touched gains immunity to charm, fright, and possession from aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead, and those creatures suffer Disadv on attack on touched
Protection From Poison (S2 [Runechild] Abju): Touched unpoisoned and gains Adv on saves vs. poison and resistance to poison damage for 1 hr

Shocking Grasp (W0 Evoc): Touched suffers 4d8 HP lightning
Sleep (S1 Ench): R90' 20' radius sleeps up to 5d8 HP of creatures, weakest first
Sleet Storm (S3 Conj): R150' 40' radius causes falls (Dex neg)
Stoneskin (S4 Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for conc or 1 hr
Suggestion (S2 Ench): R30' Target follows reasonable suggestion (Wis neg) for conc or 8 hr
Telekinesis (S5 [Runechild] Tran): R60' Moves 1000 lb 30'/rd (Str neg) for conc or 10 min
True Strike (S0 Divi): R30' Self gains Adv on next attack on target w/in 1 rd
Wall Of Fire (S4 Evoc): R120' 60'x20' wall inflicts 5d8 HP fire (Dex half) for conc or 1 min
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Know 2 W0 spells, cast 1 W1 spell/long rest
Arcane Exemplar: Discharge rune for 60' Fly, foe Disadv vs. spells, resistance to spell damage, and regain HP from casting for 1 rd 1/long rest
Careful Spell: Spend 1 Sorcery Point to protect 1 creature(s) from self spell
Distant Spell: Spend 1 Sorcery Point to dbl spell range or touch at 30'
Essence Runes: Spending Sorcery Points charges 20 runes; 5 charged runes emit 5' light
Flexible Casting: Convert Sorcery Points to and from spell slots
Font Of Magic: Use 20 Sorcery Points/long rest
Glyph Of Aegis: Use Reaction to discharge runes to negate 1d8 damage each, touch can transfer up to 3 runes for 1 hr
Manifest Inscriptions: R60' Discharge 1 rune to reveal hidden glyphs and Adv on Arcana to understand
Quickened Spell: Spend 2 Sorcery Points to cast spell as bonus action
Runic Torrent: Discharge 2 runes to change spell damage to force and push 15' or knock prone (Str neg) 1/short rest
Sigilic Augmentation: Use Reaction to discharge rune for Adv on Str, Dex, or Con checks or save for 1 rd 1/long rest
Sorcerous Restoration: Regain 4 Sorcery Points/short rest
Subtle Spell: Spend 1 Sorcery Point to cast w/out somatic or verbal components
